Student_Course_Registered_Registration_R.description: Course Section for Student Course Registration Record

validation.validation: The Course Section cannot have a status of Preliminary, Hold, or Canceled and must be for the Course Listing and Academic Period selected.
The course section can’t have a status of Closed

Student_Course_Registered_Registration_D.description: Element Container for Student Course Registration Record Data

validation.validation: A Student Course Registration Record with this ID already exists and cannot be edited.
Student must not have existing Registration Record for this Course Section on any Academic Record.

description: Element Container for Student Course Registration Data

validation.validation: A Student Course Registration with this ID already exists and cannot be edited.
The Grading Basis must be within the allowed set of Grading Basis for the Course Listing selected.
Units must be between the minimum and maximum for the course section that controls grading.
Specify a grading scheme if the student doesn't have enrollment access for the course.
To create or edit a new registration, ensure the converted course units and units are equal.
To create a new registration, ensure the student has an academic record that is active and a valid program of study status.

This course section occurs during the declare date of a new primary program of study, which uses a different academic calendar than the student’s current program of study. Register the student for a course section that occurs during an academic period that doesn’t include a primary program of study change.
